title: 阿里集团旗下「天猫」新年广告开打LGBT牌
contents:
Alibaba's Tmall promo subtly shows gay and lesbian couples celebrating new year with their families. The ad doesn't explicitly mention LGBTQ but it's a rare representation done by a big Chinese company. 


https://t.co/SxBYR4ekym


该广告没有明显提及LGBTQ 群体，但也是一个中国大型企业中少见的举动。
